ygData.subject: Re: Need Brad's email address and we all need to mail him now
ygData.msgSnippet: agreed. dont go somewhere where you will lose your body and cant retrieve it. if you lose your body from a bug, report it. when you get new armor, dont go
ygData.messageBody:
agreed. dont go somewhere where you will lose your body and cant retrieve
it. if you lose your body from a bug, report it. when you get new armor,
dont go selling your old stuff, keep it just in case. then go get it again.
this new anti-camp idea is just what the game needed. it will keep items
RARE the way they should be, and it'll make the game back to the way it was
when it started, ie mystique and awe at getting a new item, instead of
saying "oh i can just go buy it from some character".

Qorona Mindbender of the Volition Guild, 20th lvl enchanter on Cazic-Thule

At 02:24 PM 6/5/99 -0500, you wrote:
>From: "Rob Berryhill" <racefan@...>
>
>I'm sorry, but I *totally* disagree with you. Something HAS to be done
>about the farming that goes on. Too many guilds and assholes sit around
>camping GREEN MOBs so that they can get yet another item to sell at
>exorbitant prices. In my opinion, the new code is EXCELLENT and just what
>is needed. Why do you have to get that 2nd item "just in case?" Go get it
>again or buy it when you NEED it, not "just in case." There are too many
>campers for "just in case" scenarios. I say that the new patch is exactly
>what is needed.
>
>Djar Lightbringer(Tarew Marr Server)
>Servant of Light, Deliverer of the Truth to Norrath

-------------------
tim borrelli
computer character animator and crackhead extraordinaire
Volition, Inc.
timmyland@...
